item.description: Users are logical segmentations for end-users. It's a best practice to register users in order to have their information grouped and have control on both ends. It is required to have at least one user registered to create credentials |Property |Type |Description | |--- |--- |--- | |id_user | String | User ID, this is the actual subtoken that is needed in other resources | |id_external | String | External ID, this field can be null and be used to keep track of that user with an external ID | |name | String | User name | |dt_create | String | Date when the user was created | |dt_modify | String | Date modify |

item.description:
With these endpoint you can add or edit taxpayers that will be able to emit invoices

```json
{
	"taxpayer": "IXS7607092R5",
	"cerValidFrom": 1560804504,
	"cerValidTo": 1687034904
}
```

item.name: Invoices

query.description: (optional) UUID of the invoice
(optional) Filter by the RFC of the issue
(optional) Filter by the RFC of the recipient.
(optional) Filter from the date when the invoice was stamped, expected UNIX timestamp.
(optional) Filter to the date when the invoice was stamped.
(optional) Filter by the start of the register date, expected UNIX timestamp.
(optional) Filter by the end of the register date, expected UNIX timestamp.

request.description: Get all the stamped invoices for the user

query.description: (optional) UUID of the invoice
